column1: full, on off, and swings in slightly. Mistimes the drive to cover for a quick run
length ball, on off,  and seaming in slightly. Mistimes the attempted punch to cover
full, outside off, and seaming further away. Goes for the drive but the ball goes past his outside edge instead. Collective groan from the fielding side
cracked! Full, on off, and he uses the bottom hand to shovel a drive over the cover region
good length, outside leg stump, and going through to the keeper. Overcorrects his line after that boundary
good length, on off. Close to his body for the cut, and glanced to Pope at third man. He runs across to slide and intercept, but the ball goes through him! Jeez, that's a gift of two extra runs
good length, on leg. Flicked away to backward square for a single
soft dismissal! Good length, on off, and he tries to drive over cover. Through the shot too early, and chipped to Henriques at mid off
length ball, strays on the pads, misses the flick, the ball goes to short fine leg
fuller, punched straight, to the bowler's right
shot. Takes a few steps down the crease, and goes inside out over extra cover. Nice free swing of the bat
length ball on the pads again, flicked to fine leg
fuller on the stumps, patted back down the pitch
shimmies down the track, gets to the pitch of the ball and drives it through midwicket
flatter and quicker on a length on off, he goes back and slaps it to long-on
down the track again, drives it to extra cover's left
fuller on the pads, worked to deep square leg
tossed up, he was dancing down the track so it ends up as a full toss around waist height, swatted to long-on
fuller, patted back to the bowler
tailing into him, ends up on the pads, turned to fine leg
fuller length ball on the stumps, driven to mid-off
full on the stumps, flicked off his pads, good timing, but midwicket puts in a diving stop
length ball on the pads, turned to deep square leg
over the top and trickles into the wide long-on fence. Fuller on middle and he steps forward to swing this over mid-on. didn't time it perfectly but had enough to get a boundary
tucked to fine leg
clipped over cow corner! Full, on his toes, and flicked beyond the fielder in the deep
slapped over short third man! Short and wide... and Harper slashes hard at this
hat-trick of boundaries as he lofts this full ball on leg stump over the non-striker's head
finesse from Harper now. Good length, outside off, and he guides a cut through point for another four! Fielder in the deep can't cut it off either
yorker, on off. Toed back to Curran
good length, on middle. Backs away and slaps a cut through the gap near point. Edwards' chase is futile too. Massive over
good length, just outside off. Tapped to point for a quick one
full on leg from around the wicket. Skips down the ground and cramped by his own movement. Dribbled to the off side
full, on middle. Driven to long on
full, very wide outside off, but Harper walks across the stumps to meet the ball. Mistimed back to Manenti
full, outside leg stump after seeing the batsman give the charge. Uncomfortably flicked to backward square
full, on leg, and driven to long on. Another tight over from Manenti
full, on middle. Minimal turn. Struck past the bowler to long on
length ball on middle, and skidding into leg stump. Tapped back to the bowler
full, on middle, and clipped into the gap near square leg
good length, outside off and turning further away. Marsh makes room and clobbers a four through point
good length, on middle. Turning further away. Flays a mistimed cut to point
tossed up, on off. Walks down the pitch and drives down to long on
no respite for Curran! Change of ends, good length outside off, but Harper tiptoes to slap a boundary over extra cover
gets him! Low full toss, slower ball on leg. Tries to chip it over midwicket, but toe-ends it to the fielder on the 30-yard circle
full, on middle, and nudged off his toes to deep midwicket
full, on off. Checks a drive through the infield to extra cover
good length, on off. Punched off the back foot to cover
full, outside off. Slower ball, and he's through the drive too early. Edged, but past the diving short third-man fielder
good length, on middle. Pulled along the ground to midwicket
googly, lands outside leg and turns in. But still down the leg side
good length, on leg. Turning away from Marsh and his attempted cut takes an edge past the keeper's gloves
good length, on off stump. Swipes a mistimed slog to midwicket
good length, outside off. Skidding further away and cut to point
beautiful! Perfect googly. Landing on off, with Harris looking to defend with the turn. Ball spins away, and past his outside edge
the googly does it! Length ball on off, and Harris backs away to pull along midwicket. Ball turns away instead, takes the top edge and lobs into the region of short third man
fullish, on middle. From around the wicket. Shoveled to extra cover
good length, on middle. Punched to mid-off
good length, angling into him. Guided to short fine leg
full, on off. Angling away and driven off the front foot to cover
good length, outside off and skidding away. Slices a punched shot to deep point
full, on off, and driven through the diving cover fielder. Protection in the deep though
full, outside leg stump. Swept -- but to the fielder at short fine leg
good length, outside leg stump. Cramping Marsh for room. Clipped behind square again
slider, length outside off and turning even further away. Mistimes a cut to deep point
pushed through faster this time. Skidder outside off, and punched to the off side
length ball, outside off, but Marsh waits for the ball to get to him before clubbing a late cut through point for four
googly again, length outside leg stump but turning into middle. Marsh goes onto the back foot before punching to long on
full, outside off. Drilled, but straight to cover
full, outside off. Bit of turn away from the left-hander. Creams a drive to extra cover
good length, outside off. Rocks back to cut but under-edged into the deck
full, outside off and turning away. Tries to drive, but the outside edge takes it down to short third man
full toss, on leg stump. Worked to the gap between long on and deep midwicket
ends the spell well too. Good length on leg, and flicked down to long on
full, on off, from the pacer. Clipped off his toes to Dwarshuis at wide long on, but his misfield allows them to steal a second
good length, outside off. He throws his angled bat to run it down to third man... but makes no connection
good length, on leg. Worked off his hips to the gap near deep midwicket. Well placed shot that allows them to come back for the second
full, on off, and pushed past the bowler to mid off
good length, outside off, and he punches it over deep midwicket. Stopped by wide long on
full, on off. Swiped to the leg side, and he misses
full, on off. Tapped to long on for a single
full outside off. Opens his bat's face to drill through covers
good length, outside off. Away from his body, and cut to deep point
good length, on leg stump. Guided off his hips to fine leg
back of a length, outside off, and cut to deep point
good length, outside off and angling into his body. Too close for the cut. Mistimed to short third man
full, on leg stump. Drilled to wide long on

given! Good length on off, but the googly turns inwards. He presses backward to flick, but misses the shot. Hits his front leg and given by the umpire. Webster gives the ump a second loo before walking back
full, on off. Pushed to midwicket
full on off. Pushed to wide long on
good length, on leg. Swiped off the back foot to long on
full, outside off. Driven with the legbreak to extra cover. Terrific spell
full, outside off. Sliced through the point region, and the ball very nearly hits a beach ball on the ground. Fielder in the deep avoids it all, and slides across to stop the boundary
full, on off stump. Drilled to long on
slower ball, full on off. Deceived by it, and through his drive too early. Pops into the air, but just past the bowler's right
good length, outside off. Throws his bat at this to cut, and edged to short third man
full on middle, and drilled to deep midwicket
full, on off. Swings across the line, and mistimes to square leg
good length, on leg stump. Pulled square to deep midwicket
easy dismissal at wide long on. Full, on off, and his attempted slog doesn't have the power. Captain calls early and takes a reverse-cup catch
full, on leg stump. Flicked behind square for a single
good length, on middle. Backs away and cuts to point
good length, on middle. Punched to long on
good length, on off. Flicked to square leg for a single. They want a second, but don't get it
good length, on middle, and the attempted cut is under-edged to fine leg
good length, angling into his body. Flicked to backward square leg
good length, outside off. Guided to third man
back of a length, outside off. Pulled along the ground to midwicket
good length, outside off. Attempted cut but misses
good length, outside off. Punched to cover
full, outside off, and driven to long off
full toss on middle. He walks across the stumps and paddles this past short fine leg
full and wide outside off. He drags a sweep to deep midwicket for a couple more. Nice commitment from the runners
lucky but he'll take them. Full, outside off, and the attempted clobbered shot takes an edge past the keeper
slower ball, good length outside off. Christian walks into the shot and hammers a four through extra cover! Curran's conceded 50+ now
Curran ends with 58 tonight in his four overs. Full toss, on leg, and muscled over cow corner
taken in the deep! Full, on middle, and tries to smack it over cow corner. Doesn't get the distance, and Silk gets under it
full on leg, and swept behind square for a single
good length, outside off. Makes room and cuts to point
full, outside off from around the wicket. Drilled to cover
slower ball, just over off stump as he misses the pull
good length, outside off. Clubbed to cover. Renegades finish on 153 for 6
dispatched! Full, on off, and he takes a giant stride to slog over cow corner!
full, on middle. Mistimed back to the bowler
full, on leg. Comes down the wicket and works it into the gap near midwicket
good length, on off. Cut square to point
full, outside off. Drive to cover
full, on middle. Pushed to wide mid on
full outside off, and driven to cover
good length, on middle. Cut to point
full, on leg stump. Clipped to square leg
dropped! Back of a length, on off. Tries to flat-bat it over Richardson's head, but toe-ends it instead. Straight to the bowler but he can't hold on to a difficult catch
good length, outside off. And the attempted cut takes an inside edge to the leg side
good length, on leg stump, and tapped to midwicket
full, middle, and square leg
good length, outside off. Punched to extra cover for a single
good length, on off. Pulled along the ground to deep midwicket
good length, on off. And flicked to deep midwicket
back of a length, on middle. Mistimes a pull to deep midwicket
slower ball, full on off. And driven to cover
good length, outside off. Punched to cover
full, on leg stump. Deep midwicket
good length, on leg, and swiped to deep midwicket
good length, on leg stump. Flicked behind square to deep midwicket
full, on off. Flicked through deep midwicket! Thirteen runs over
full, outside off stump. Through the drive too early... and mistimed to cover
good length, outside leg stump. On the bounce to the keeper
good length, on middle. Attempted pull takes an under edge to the leg side
full, on off, and driven straight. Hits Richardson's knees and rolls to mid on
good length, on off. Punched to cover
good length, on middle, Deep midwicket
full, on off, and driven straight down the ground. Straight to mid-on, and dropped by the fielder
full, on leg stump. Makes room and hammers it over extra cover
good length, on leg stump. Mistimes the attempted pull to short fine leg
full, on leg stump. Driven to deep midwicket
good length, on leg stump. Skips down the wicket to muscle it down to mid on
good length, on leg stump. Makes room and cuts to point. They scamper across for a single
full, on leg stump. Tapped off the back foot to midwicket. Non-striker wants the single, but he is sent back
full, on off. And shoveled to deep extra cover
full, outside off. Swiped to deep midwicket
good length, on middle. Pulled along the ground to deep midwicket
good length, outside off. Cut to deep point
full, on off, and turning away. Pushed to mid on
good length, outside off. Punched to mid off
good length, on middle, and he mistimes the pull to the leg side. Ball hits his groin
good length, on middle, and flat-batted down the ground to long on
full, on off, and shoveled to extra cover. Ball goes to bounce though to the man in the boundary
full, on leg stump. Drilled to extra cover for a couple more
good length, outside off. Ball goes on the bounce to the keeper. Misses the ramp
full, on off. Driven to long on for a couple more
full, on middle, and driven to midwicket
full, on middle. And driven to extra cover
good length, outside off. And flicked off his hips to deep midwicket
good length, on middle. Attempted flick takes a leading edge to cover
full toss on middle stump. Flicked off his hips behind square to the gap in the deep
good length, on middle. Pulled along the ground to deep midwicket
through him! Gets a wicket in his very first delivery. Good length, on middle, and he goes for a leg-side swipe. Ball goes through his defense and knocks his middle stump over
good length, on middle. Nudged off his hips to square leg
good length, on middle. Flicked to square leg
good length, outside off. Guided off the back foot to point
full and wide outside off. Turning further away and the attempted drive falls just short of cover point
half-tracker, outside off, and flayed to deep point for a single
good length, outside off. The attempted cut goes past the fielder at point
good length, on middle. Flicked to midwicket
good length, outside off. The attempted punch takes a leading edge to the leg side
in the air and taken at deep midwicket! Tossed up on off, and the slog sweep finds the fielder in the deep. Renegades roaring!
good length, on off. Punched to extra cover
fullish, on off. Defended
good length, on leg stump. Worked into the gap past the square-leg umpire for a single
good length, on middle. Attempts to paddle square, but inside-edged onto his body
appeal for lbw and given! Just what Finch was saying he wanted his bowler to do. Full on off, and the attempted sweep has hit his front leg. Umpire swift to raise his finger
good length, on middle. Tapped off the back foot to cover. Bit of turn
full, on middle. Makes room and hammers it inside-out over cover
good length, on leg stump. Nudged around the corner to square leg for a quick run
back of a length, outside off. Tapped with soft hands to the gap near point
good length, angling in. Tapped to point on this occasion
good length, angling in. Guided to midwicket to take a quick single
good length, on off. Nudged off his hips to square leg
full, outside off. Caresses a drive to extra cover
lucky for Vince! Length ball, close to his body for the cut, and the cut takes an edge between keeper and short third man
full, on off stump. Driven to the cover fielder in the deep
half-tracker, outside off and skidding through. Opens the bat's face to guide a shot towards point
full, on middle. Makes room and drives to cover. Can't pinch the single though
tossed up on leg stump. Drives the googly down to midwicket
good length, outside off.  Punched off the back foot into the gap near extra cover
good length, on off. Slapped through to the sweeper-fielder in the deep. The second run could be dangerous, and the throw from the deep is flat as well, but Silk might just have returned in time
good length, on leg stump. Nudged to the leg side
full outside leg stump. Clipped off his toes to extra cover
full, on off. Driven inside-out down to long off. Misfield from Richardson - due to the extra bounce off the practice pitches - allows Sixers to take the second run
appeal for run out but they complete it swiftly. Silk took off for the run as soon as Vince cut it to short third man
fullish, on off. He caresses a drive gently into the gap near wide long off for a couple more
good length, on leg, and paddled over short fine leg! Smooth as....
full and wide, and the attempted square drive is timed perfectly. Flies past the diving point fielder, and there's nobody in the deep either
full, on off. Pushed to cover, and that's his first dot ball of the innings
length ball, outside off. Cut to point
good length, on off. Pulled hard - along the ground - to the fielder at cow corner
length ball, angling into off stump. Swiped leg-side to Marsh at deep backward square
full, outside off, and he caresses a drive to long off
good length, outside off. Cut to deep point
good length, very wide outside off. Clubbed to cover and they scamper across for one
good length, outside off. Slaps a cut to deep point
good length, on off. Swings across the line and sends this down to deep backward square
full and wide outside off. Tries to drive through cover, but flies off the bat's inside half to the non-striker. Richardson gives the ball a chase
full and wide outside off. Bends his knees and clatters a drive to extra cover. Single off each ball this over
faster ball, length on off, and some extra bounce. Silk looks to cut but misses

tossed up on middle, and driven through the covers! Fielder at long off runs towards the boundary and cups the ball back while going beyond the rope. Christian the man with the fielding there. Brilliance
tossed up on middle, but dipping sharply. Toe ends this full toss to deep midwicket. Throw from the deep hits the stumps at the bowlers' end, but they choose not to take the second run
yorker length, on middle. Squirted into the gap near square leg. Two more
tees off! Full, outside off, and slogged into the second tier at cow corner. Picks the legbreak well
strikes next ball! Faster ball, full and straight on middle, and Vince can't connect with the slog. The bails have lit up and Vince has to go back to the dugout
slower ball, wide outside off. Mistimes the cut back to Richardson

full and wide outside off, but Silk has struck a lofted cover drive over the extra cover boundary! Finch on the mic says 'what's the fielder standing so far inside the boundary line for?'. If the fielder was on the line, Silk could've been out
slower ball, full outside off. Looks to swing leg side but deceived by the lack of pace
slower ball again, length ball outside off, and he can't connect with the dragged swipe. Through to the keeper, just inside the tramlines
good length, outside off. Bunted to cover for a quick run
dot ball to end the spell. Good length outside off again, but the lack of pace goes under the bat
back of a length, outside off. Flat-batted back to Gleeson, and the ball bursts through his hands for the batsmen to take a single
they pinch a single as the ball goes under Curran's bat. Another slower ball outside off. Silk would've been out had Harper got the direct hit from behind the stumps
just over cow corner! Back of a length, outside off, and pulled over the fielder on the boundary. That six was 81m long
yorker length, on middle, and drilled to deep midwicket. Scores tied
full on off, and the inside-edged shot goes to cover. They scamper across and Sixers win by six wickets
